nodes.excerpt: Idenati is designed to simplify your experience, to organize everything you do online in one place, allowing you to focus and be more productive.
nodes.title: Idenati - Organize everything you do online in one place
nodes.author: Jeremy

nodes.excerpt: Dola is a 1-click checkout and digital wallet. Unlike Apple, Google, or Shop Pay, Dola works on every browser and device, and is platform agnostic.
nodes.title: Dola (Beta) - 1-click checkout and digital wallet

nodes.excerpt: Trend brainstorms, deep dives into different ecosystem (including case studies and gaps in the market analyses), expert interviews, and niche market data to help founders and investors spot opportunities.
nodes.title: Opportunities.so - Deep dives, trend brainstorms, and niche data for founders

nodes.excerpt: Start creating your app with clean mind and clear representing of screen structure. There are 12 device mockups in the pack, for both iPhone and Android. Carefully created A4 format templates that perfectly repeat the real device sizes. PNG, JPG, PDF formats.
nodes.title: Printables - Free printable templates for your mobile sketching
nodes.author: Vitaly Belousov

nodes.excerpt: Want to replace annoying SMS 2FA codes? We verify your users by the way they type 4 words. This improves UX significantly and reduces costs by an order of magnitude. Btw: you can get the solution free of charge for a limited time. Check the website for more.
nodes.title: TypingDNA Verify - Replace SMS 2FA codes with better UX: just type 4 words

nodes.excerpt: A playful, yellow page themed directory of brands that shows you which tools brands are using.
nodes.title: 1-800-D2C - See which tools are powering the best D2Cs
nodes.author: Tim Masek

nodes.excerpt: Do you find yourself digging through email threads trying to find the version of a contract in which a specific change was introduced? Who proposed the change? Was it your lawyer, or your customer? If this pain is familiar, Version Story is here to help.
nodes.title: Version Story - Git for lawyers
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: Daily makes it easy to build real-time audio apps. We're a developer platform for audio and video APIs. Check out our Starter Kit with sample code for React, Android, ReactNative, and iOS. You can build audio fast, and scale with our secure infrastructure.
nodes.title: Daily - Build audio apps in a weekend

nodes.excerpt: Post.co is the best way to share big and small news across your team. Designed as a substitute for messy threads and awkward reply-all team emails, Post is a simple, low-stakes way to share team-wide updates. Great for remote teams to stay connected.
nodes.title: Post - The simplest way to post big or small news across your team.

nodes.excerpt: This newsletter is made with serious love. I've selected and partnered with some of the funniest indie comic artists in the world. This daily newsletter will put a smile on your face.
